title: RNA metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for processing metrics of a RNA-seq library.

median_genes_per_cell.title: Median genes per cell
median_genes_per_cell.description: Median number of genes detected (with nonzero UMI counts) across cell-associated barcodes.

frac_reads_mapped_to_genome.title: Fraction of reads mapped to the genome
frac_reads_mapped_to_genome.description: Fraction of reads that mapped to genome

frac_reads_mapped_antisense_to_gene.title: Fraction of reads mapped antisense to a gene
frac_reads_mapped_antisense_to_gene.description: Fraction of reads that mapped antisense to a gene

frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_transcr.title: Fraction of reads mapped confidently to the transcriptome
frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_transcr.description: Fraction of reads mapped to a unique gene in the transcriptome with high mapping quality score.

frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_exonic_.title: Fraction of reads mapped confidently to exonic regions
frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_exonic_.description: Fraction of reads that mapped to the exonic regions of the genome with high mapping quality score.

frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_introni.title: Fraction of reads mapped confidently to intronic regions
frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_introni.description: Fraction of reads that mapped to the intronic regions of genome with a high mapping quality score.

frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_interge.title: Fraction of reads mapped confidently to intergenic regions
frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_interge.description: Fraction of reads that mapped to the intergenic regions of the genome with a high mapping quality score.

frac_q30_bases_in_rna_read.title: Fraction of Q30 bases in rna read
frac_q30_bases_in_rna_read.description: Fraction of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the RNA read sequence

frac_q30_bases_in_rna_read2.title: Fraction of Q30 bases in rna read2
frac_q30_bases_in_rna_read2.description: Fraction of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the RNA read2 sequence
frac_q30_bases_in_rna_read2.comment: Output only if cellranger assay chemistry is SC5P-PE, as a result of R1 being sequenced longer than 28 bases

frac_reads_with_tso.title: Fraction of reads with TSO
frac_reads_with_tso.description: Fraction of reads with an alignment score of â‰¥ 20 for the template switch oligo (TSO) sequence.

frac_valid_umis.title: Fraction of reads with valid UMIs
frac_valid_umis.description: Fraction of read pairs with valid UMIs i.e. without Ns and are not homopolymers.

frac_transcriptomic_reads_in_cells.title: Fraction of transcriptomic reads in cells
frac_transcriptomic_reads_in_cells.description: Fraction of transcriptomic reads with a valid barcode that are associated with cell-containing partitions.
frac_transcriptomic_reads_in_cells.comment: Transcriptomic reads are defined as reads with mapping quality = 255 that map to a unique gene, including intronic alignments (default mode). When excluding introns the transcriptome is restricted to alignments that are consistent with annotated splice junctions. Note that transcriptomic reads include UMI reads, duplicate reads, and reads marked as low-support molecules.

total_genes_detected.title: Total genes detected
total_genes_detected.description: The number of genes with at least one UMI count in any cell.

median_umi_counts_per_cell.description: The median number of total UMI counts across all cell-associated barcodes.
